short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save selected text as quotes or input your own. Display quotes randomly to remind you of past motivational messages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of your personal quotes! With this extension, you can store quotes from the web or from your own inputs and randomly pick from them whenever you need a mood boost!

Save selected text to your personal quote list using right click --> Add to Quote List.

You could also input your own quotes through the extension pop-up. 

Scroll through or search for your quotes in the pop-up.

Remind yourself of past motivational messages: press the Pick Random Quote button to display a randomly picked quote from your list.

If you have further questions, contact mkazarian116@gmail.com.
